text: Although it says coffee shop, they also sell juices. Ordered a big cup of sugar juice with lemon and it cost me $4.30. I thought it was a little overpriced, but it’s my fault that I didn’t check before ordering. The juice was quite watered down for that price point. Will probably try the other stalls.

Worst drink stall ever. Who sells chin chow drink with NO CHIN CHOW? Also his sugarcane drinks are watered down n sells at $4.50. Had the audacity to tell me he’s been selling it this way for over 10 years.

Heng Heng Coffee House doesnt sell coffee!!
Stall owner is confrontational and intimidating!
Order at your own risk!!

Might have discovered the worst hawker stall in Singapore!!! Chin Chow drink with no chin chow and sugar cane tastes almost 1/3 diluted. Don’t even try telling the owner. Some lame excuse will follow…
Drinks selling in this stall was the most expensive stall in this hawker center.
